briefTitle: Development of Assist Tool for Breast Examination Using the Principle of Ultrasonic Sensor
officialTitle: Development of Assist Tool for Breast Examination Using the Principle of Ultrasonic Sensor : A Development and Validation Study
conditions: Breast Cancer, Breast Neoplasm, Artificial Intelligence, Ultrasonography, Benign Breast Disease
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female patients between 18 and 80 years of age who are scheduled for surgery after a tumor has been confirmed on breast ultrasound examination

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients diagnosed with breast cancer after biopsy with non-mass enhancement or calcification
* Inflammatory breast cancer
* Patients whose cancer has invaded the skin and broken through
* Patients with skin diseases
* Women who refused to participate in the study
